column4: Microsoft pushes 'mixed reality' features with Windows 10 update
column5: BERLIN Microsoft is to update its flagship operating system next month so that the latest generation of Windows 10 hardware devices and software can tap into augmented and virtual reality technologies  executives said on Friday.

column4: UPDATE 2-Microsoft pushes "mixed reality" features with Windows 10 update
column5: * Windows 10 update to include new photo  storage  game features

column4: Microsoft pushes AR/VR features with Oct. Windows 10 update
column5: BERLIN  Sept 1 Microsoft is set to update its flagship operating system to enable the latest generation of Windows 10 hardware devices and software to tap augmented and virtual reality  among a range of new features  executives said on Friday.

column4: U.S. labor board files complaint against Tesla over worker rights
column5: The U.S. agency in charge of enforcing labor law on Thursday filed a complaint against electric carmaker Tesla Inc   saying it found merit to workers' complaints about unfair labor practices.

column4: U.S. labor board files complaint against Tesla over worker rights
column5: Aug 31 The U.S. agency in charge of enforcing labor law on Thursday filed a complaint against electric carmaker Tesla Inc  saying it found merit to workers' complaints about unfair labor practices.
